title: Malaya: land of tin and rubber
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Milan Herzog
brief_description: A survey of life in rain forests of the Malay Peninsula, showing production of latex on a rubber plantation, mining and processing of tin ore, and activities on the island of Singapore. Discusses Malaya’s position in the area of world trade and reviews contributions of Chinese, Malayas, Indians, and Europeans to present-day culture.
